messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Funky house colors
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/10/03 4:43:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... We won t be visible to our neighbors (I love that) The purple is going to be a deep purple
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/10/03 4:43:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> My friend has a purple house. It's a pale purple but definately purple.
> I love it as does my daughter, but I take it the neighbors aren't fond
> of it.

We won't be visible to our neighbors (I love that) The purple is going to be
a deep purple stain, like a pickle. (Not an eating pickle but a pickling
stain.)
Purple is also my favorite color.
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Funky house colors
messages.msgSnippet: The house itself (siding) will be purple, only the window frames are green. But I think that it would be strange, Blue may work as that is the color of the
messages.messageBody:
The house itself (siding) will be purple, only the window frames are green.
But I think that it would be strange, Blue may work as that is the color of the
door.
I like the sparkly idea!!

*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.
